resources.string:
Your Book is not published yet!

Please log in to your BookAgoo account via desk/laptop to edit and securely publish your Book online.

Just started your Free account? Please add your first content to begin your BookAgoo journey!
By clicking Save and continue, you agree to BookAgoo Terms of Service end Privacy Policy, including Use of Cookies.
BookAgoo App will help you to create your baby’s first year Digital Book in the easiest and the most comfortable way.

Sign up for Free account and fill the profile 

Start capturing photos, videos, sounds and notes on the go! 

Mark each piece of content with appropriate tag from available list of tags. This will help to keep your content properly organized in the Book from the very beginning 

Send it all to the Wall, home of all captured things 

Follow our notifications to track all your moments 

Login to your BookAgoo.com via desk/laptop to try, preview or edit your Book template. Publish your Book securely online or store it locally. 

Access your published Book directly from the App or from any other device!
Log in to your BookAgoo account with your email and password. \nYou can also use your Facebook or Twitter credentials for quick login.
Forgot your password? Tap the “Forgot?” button and we’ll reset your password in a few seconds!

Enter your email and password, your baby’s details, even if it’s not born yet and tap “Save and continue”. Now your Free BookAgoo account is created. You can edit your profile details anytime accessing it from the menu at the top left corner. \nYour account data is kept securely on our server and never shared with any application, network or person.
Your profile allows you to view and edit your account status, login details, password, connected social networks, your baby and other family members’ info.

You may already have collected some precious moments on your device: images, videos or even sounds. Post’em on the Wall – the base of your baby’s Digital Book. Or start creating your moments and send them to the Wall on the go. \nTap the Wall to start filling it with your content. \nThe Wall is a home of all your posts shown as you publish them in calendar order.
After having published your first post you can already start creating your Digital Book. \nPlease login to your BookAgoo account via desk/laptop for further steps.
Line at the top indicates available storage space on your Free account. You can always upgrade to Pro 2 GB account from your free account.
Choose type of content you wish to post on your Wall: photo/video, sound or text note.

Select media file on your device or enter a text note. You can share this post via Facebook or Twitter. Please mark each piece of content with appropriate tag from available tags below. This will help to keep your content properly organized in the Book from the very beginning. Tap Add to publish your first post.
Special content does not appear directly on the Wall. It is a part of your Digital Book that keeps record of your baby’s growth and its teeth. Don’t forget to update records!

Notifications help you to keep track of things that happen with and around your baby and family even before the baby is born. You will not forget or miss any exciting moment and an important milestone of your new life.

Your baby’s BookAgoo Digital Book is built upon a pre-created stylish template. Its color scheme depends on your baby’s gender. When you post your captured moments to the Wall, they appear also inside your Book under certain sections according to tags you mark those posts. Tags allow your Book to grow and create itself almost automatically with the least effort from your side. Edit your Book, play with it, preview and publish it online via your desktop/laptop.
Start using BookAgoo and taste its full features and ops!
The Pro account is a subscription-based service and it operates on annual subscription mode. Annual fee of the Pro account is $.

At the end of your subscription period we will notify you to renew your account. \n\nPro members are never upgraded or moved to a different paid service / pricing plan automatically without their permission
Start using BookAgoo with Free account, explore all the features and upgrade to the Pro account.
The first year digital book that grows with your child.
Swipe to find out how it works
Start capturing photos, videos, sounds and notes on the go!

This will help to keep your content organized in the Book from the very beginning.
Send it all to the Wall, home of all captured things

BookAgoo App will help you to create your baby’s first year Digital Book in the easiest and the most comfortable way.
